item.text: I wish that you would be patient with me in a little foolishness, but indeed you are being patient with me!

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I am <st data-num="2206" class="">jealous</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> with <st data-num="2316" class="">godly</st> <st data-num="2205" class="">jealousy</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> I <st data-num="718" class="">promised</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="718">in marriage</st> to <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="435" class="">husband</st>,<n id="1" /> to <st data-num="3936" class="">present</st> you as a <st data-num="53" class="">pure</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3933" class="">virgin</st> to <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> I am <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid</st> that<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5613">just as</st> the <st data-num="3789" class="">serpent</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1818" class="">deceived</st> <st data-num="2096" class="">Eve</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3834" class="">treachery</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3540" class="">minds</st> may be <st data-num="5351">led astray</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> a <st data-num="572" class="">sincere</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="54">pure<n id="5" /> devotion</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> someone <st data-num="2064" class="">comes</st> and <st data-num="2784" class="">proclaims</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="243" class="">another</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> different from <st data-num="3739" class="">the one</st> we <st data-num="2784" class="">proclaimed</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> if you <st data-num="2983" class="">receive</st> a <st data-num="2087" class="">different</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> than <st data-num="3739" class="">the one</st> you <st data-num="2983" class="">received</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> a <st data-num="2087" class="">different</st> <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st> than <st data-num="3739" class="">the one</st> you <st data-num="1209" class="">accepted</st>,<n id="4" /> you <st data-num="430" class="">put up</st> with it <st data-num="2573" class="">well</st> enough!<n id="5" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I <st data-num="3049" class="">consider</st> myself <st data-num="3367">not at all</st> <st data-num="5302" class="">inferior</st> to those “<st data-num="5228">super</st>-<st data-num="652">apostles</st>.”<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> I am <st data-num="2399" class="">unskilled</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">speaking</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">yet</st> I am certainly <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> so in <st data-num="1108" class="">knowledge</st>. <st data-num="235" class="">Indeed</st>, we have <st data-num="5319" class="">made</st> this <st data-num="5319" class="">plain</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every way</st>.

<st data-num="2228" class="">Or</st> did I <st data-num="4160" class="">commit</st> a <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> by <st data-num="5013" class="">humbling</st> <st data-num="1683" class="">myself</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> could be <st data-num="5312" class="">exalted</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> I <st data-num="2097" class="">proclaimed</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1432">free of charge</st>?

I <st data-num="4813" class="">robbed</st> <st data-num="243" class="">other</st> <st data-num="1577" class="">churches</st> by <st data-num="2983" class="">receiving</st> <st data-num="3800" class="">support</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">from</st> them so that I could <st data-num="1248">serve</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st>!<n id="1" />

When<n id="1" /> I <st data-num="3918">was</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> was <st data-num="5302" class="">in need</st>, I was <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> a <st data-num="2655">burden</st> to <st data-num="3762" class="">anyone</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st> who <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3109" class="">Macedonia</st> <st data-num="4322">fully supplied</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5303" class="">needs</st>.<n id="2" /> I<n id="3" /> <st data-num="5083" class="">kept</st> <st data-num="1683" class="">myself</st> from being a <st data-num="4" class="">burden</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956">any way</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> will <st data-num="5083">continue to do so</st>.

As the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2746" class="">boasting</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">of</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">mine</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="5420" class="">stopped</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2824" class="">regions</st> of <st data-num="882" class="">Achaia</st>.

<st data-num="1223 5101">Why</st>? <st data-num="3754" class="">Because</st> I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="25" class="">love</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>? <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">knows</st> I do!<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> I am <st data-num="4160" class="">doing</st> I will <st data-num="4160" class="">continue to do</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> I may <st data-num="1581" class="">eliminate</st> any <st data-num="874" class="">opportunity</st> for those who <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> a <st data-num="874" class="">chance</st> to be <st data-num="2147">regarded</st> <st data-num="2531">as</st> <st data-num="1473">our</st> <st data-num="2532">equals</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3739" class="">things</st> they <st data-num="2744" class="">boast</st> about.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5108">such people</st> are <st data-num="5570">false apostles</st>, <st data-num="1386" class="">deceitful</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2040" class="">workers</st>, <st data-num="3345" class="">disguising</st> themselves<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">as</st> <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="2295" class="">wonder</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> even <st data-num="4567" class="">Satan</st> <st data-num="3345" class="">disguises</st> <st data-num="846" class="">himself</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">as</st> an <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> of <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st>.
Therefore it is not surprising his servants also disguise themselves as servants of righteousness, whose end will correspond to their actions.
I say again, let no one think that I am a fool. But if you do, then at least accept me as a fool, so that I too may boast a little.

<st data-num="3739" class="">What</st> I am <st data-num="2980" class="">saying</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2746" class="">boastful</st> <st data-num="5287" class="">confidence</st><n id="1" /> I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">say</st> <st data-num="2596">the way</st> the <st data-num="2962">Lord</st> would.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="235">Instead</st> it is, <st data-num="5613">as</st> it were, <st data-num="877" class="">foolishness</st>.

<st data-num="1893" class="">Since</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st><n id="1" /> are <st data-num="2744" class="">boasting</st> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> <st data-num="4561">human standards</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2504">I too</st> will <st data-num="2744" class="">boast</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> since you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> so <st data-num="5429" class="">wise</st>, you <st data-num="430" class="">put up</st> with<n id="1" /> <st data-num="878" class="">fools</st> <st data-num="2234" class="">gladly</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> you <st data-num="430">put up with</st><n id="1" /> it <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="2615">makes slaves</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="2719" class="">exploits</st> you, <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="2983">takes advantage</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="1869">behaves arrogantly</st><n id="2" /> toward you, <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="1194" class="">strikes</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4383" class="">face</st>.

(<st data-num="2596">To</st> my <st data-num="819" class="">disgrace</st><n id="1" /> I must <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> <st data-num="3754">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> were <st data-num="770">too weak</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that!)</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="302" class="">whatever</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> else <st data-num="5111" class="">dares</st> to boast about<n id="3" /> (I am <st data-num="3004" class="">speaking</st> <st data-num="877" class="">foolishly)</st>, <st data-num="2504" class="">I also</st> <st data-num="5111" class="">dare</st> to boast about the same thing.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1510" class="">Are</st> they <st data-num="1445" class="">Hebrews</st>? <st data-num="2504" class="">So am I</st>. Are <st data-num="1510" class="">they</st> <st data-num="2475" class="">Israelites</st>? <st data-num="2504" class="">So am I</st>. <st data-num="1510">Are</st> they <st data-num="4690" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="11" class="">Abraham</st>? <st data-num="2504">So am I</st>.

<st data-num="1510">Are</st> they <st data-num="1249" class="">servants</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>? <st data-num="1473" class="">(I</st> am <st data-num="2980" class="">talking</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">like</st> I am <st data-num="3912" class="">out of my mind</st>!) <st data-num="1473">I</st> am even <st data-num="5228">more</st> so: <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4056" class="">much greater</st> <st data-num="2873" class="">labors</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4056" class="">far more</st> <st data-num="5438" class="">imprisonments</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5234">more severe</st> <st data-num="4127" class="">beatings</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">facing</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st> <st data-num="4178">many times</st>.

<st data-num="3999">Five times</st> I <st data-num="2983" class="">received</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> <st data-num="5062" class="">forty</st> lashes <st data-num="3844" class="">less</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="5151" class="">Three times</st> I was <st data-num="4463">beaten with a rod</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="530" class="">Once</st> I <st data-num="3034">received a stoning</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5151" class="">Three times</st> I <st data-num="3489">suffered shipwreck</st>. A <st data-num="3574" class="">night and a day</st> I <st data-num="4160" class="">spent</st> adrift <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="1037" class="">open sea</st>.

I have been on <st data-num="3597" class="">journeys</st> <st data-num="4178">many times</st>, in <st data-num="2794" class="">dangers</st> from <st data-num="4215" class="">rivers</st>, in <st data-num="2794" class="">dangers</st> from <st data-num="3027" class="">robbers</st>,<n id="1" /> in <st data-num="2794" class="">dangers</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">from</st> my own <st data-num="1085" class="">countrymen</st>, in <st data-num="2794" class="">dangers</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st>, in <st data-num="2794" class="">dangers</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st>, in <st data-num="2794" class="">dangers</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2047" class="">wilderness</st>,<n id="2" /> in <st data-num="2794" class="">dangers</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> <st data-num="2281" class="">sea</st>, in <st data-num="2794" class="">dangers</st> <st data-num="1722">from</st> <st data-num="5569" class="">false brothers</st>,

<st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2873">hard work</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3449" class="">toil</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">through</st> <st data-num="4178" class="">many</st> <st data-num="70">sleepless nights</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3042" class="">hunger</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1373" class="">thirst</st>, <st data-num="4178" class="">many times</st> <st data-num="3521">without food</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5592" class="">cold</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1132">without enough clothing</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="5565">Apart from</st> <st data-num="3924">other things</st>,<n id="1" /> there is the <st data-num="2250">daily</st> <st data-num="1999" class="">pressure</st> on <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> of my <st data-num="3308">anxious concern</st><n id="2" /> for <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">churches</st>.

<st data-num="5101" class="">Who</st> is <st data-num="770" class="">weak</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I am <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="770" class="">weak</st>? <st data-num="5101" class="">Who</st> is <st data-num="4624">led into sin</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4448">burn with indignation</st>?

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> I <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> <st data-num="2744" class="">boast</st>,<n id="1" /> I will <st data-num="2744" class="">boast</st> about the <st data-num="3588">things</st> that show <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="769" class="">weakness</st>.<n id="2" />

The <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, who <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2128" class="">blessed</st> <st data-num="165" class="">forever</st>, <st data-num="1492" class="">knows</st> I am <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5574" class="">lying</st>.

<st data-num="1722" class="">In</st> <st data-num="1154" class="">Damascus</st>, the <st data-num="1481" class="">governor</st><n id="1" /> under <st data-num="935" class="">King</st> <st data-num="702" class="">Aretas</st> was <st data-num="5432" class="">guarding</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st> of <st data-num="1153" class="">Damascus</st><n id="2" /> in order to <st data-num="4084" class="">arrest</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>,
but I was let down in a rope-basket through a window in the city wall, and escaped his hands.
